}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :Qualcomm Hi-Fi Bluetooth for [[Nintendo]] NS
*[[GuliKit Route+ GB1]] (USB-C) • B07G3D1KS2 :Bluetooth: [[CSR]] ([[Qualcomm]]) BC57E687CG :Flash: ''cFeon'' EN29LV160CB (2MB CMOS)
===Teardown=== ;• [https://www.cirmall.com/articles/28861 Teardown on '''Cirmall'''] (CN) *Bluetooth: [[CSR]] ([[Qualcomm]]) BC57E687CG :Bluetooth RF Transceiver IC, Quartz 16МHz *Flash: ''cFeon'' EN29LV160CB (2MB CMOS) *MicrOne [http://www.microne.com.cn/ProductDetail.aspx?id=26 ME6210] (HOPA) - LDO (+5V) :(6210A 1817/50) - 6-pin (2x chips) *MicrOne [http://www.microne.com.cn/ProductDetail.aspx?id=25 ME6209] (V1RA) - LDO (+3.3V, max 18V) *Legendary [http://www.legendary.net.cn/html/en/product/USB-C_PD/201610/902.html LDR6023S] - USB PD Controller (USB-C) *Alpha & Omega AO4805 - 30V 9A 2W Dual P-Channel MOSFET *Alpha & Omega AO4407A - 30V 12A 3W P-Channel MOSFET :[[Alpha & Omega]] (''Alpha & Omega Semiconductor Inc.'')
===Specifications=== *Brand：GuliKit; Model: Route+ (v1.0); Part number：GB1 *Product name: USB-C Bluetooth Audio Transmitter :Input port： USB Type-C (USB 3.0) *Bluetooth version： Bluetooth 3.0 + EDR :Transmission distance： 10m/33ft :Frequency range： 2.402-2.480 GHz *Supported protocols： Qualcomm aptX LL, :aptX, A2DP, AVRCP, AFH, HFP, HSP *Support Power Role Swap :USB PD Spec Rev 2.0 compatible :Support all standard power profiles *Input voltage: 5V/9V/12V/15V; Input current: Max 3.1A *Output voltage: 5V/9V/12V/15V; Output current: Max 3A *Product Size: 47mm x 19mm x 11mm; Package Weight: 102g *Packaging: Bluetooth Audio Transmitter *1pcs :Type-C cable dock adapter *1pcs *Material: PC; Color: Black
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:GuliKit Route+ GB1 13-7.png| File:GuliKit Route+ GB1 3-29.png| File:GuliKit Route+ GB1 5-22.png| File:GuliKit Route+ GB1 4-29.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== *[[Nintendo Switch]] (NS) • [https://www.cirmall.com/articles/29019 Teardown] :CPU: [[nVIDIA]] Tegra X1 T210B01 (16nm) :Tegra X1 (20nm), RAM: LPDDR4 (LPDDR4X)
